subject: HSBC BANK USA
body:
HSBC BANK USA
Address: 1818 H Street, NW Washington, D.C, 20433, USA
Email: 
desmonwalter001@us.hsbc.com
Telephone: +1-917-933-3572
From The Desk Of Mr. Desmond Walter
Director HSBC BANK PLC USA
                          For The Immediate Release Of Your Fund Valued US$10,000,000.00 US Dollars With Payment Number: IMF/19/RF/2024
Ref Payment Number: IMF/19/RF/24
Attn:
We received an instruction a few weeks from Mrs. Esther, to transfer the sum of $10 million into your account which we are in the process of transferring the fund into your regular account, or to convert your fund into an ATM Master Card and dispatch it to your receiving address.
To our great surprise on last friday 1/12/2024, we received an email from One Ms. Diane L. Mcallister, who claims to be your representative and forwarded to us the following account information for transfer of the donation fund into her account. She came in with one of our staff for the claim.
The account which she presented to me was as follow.
Bank of America
St. Petersburg, Florida, USA
Account Name: Diane L. Mcallister
Account #: 003767127294
Routing #: 063100277
65 Jabotinsky St\#2
Ramat Gan, ISRAEL 54224
Please, Do reconfirm to us as a matter of urgency if this lady is from you and has your authority to receive your fund. 
If this lady is not your representative, you are requested to fill and send this information for verification purpose
, so that your fund value of $10 million United State dollars will be paid to you through bank transfer or by ATM Master Card.
1. Your Full Name..........................
2. Your Telephone......
3. Fax...........................
4. Age...........
5. Sex........................... .........
6. Your Occupation.................... ............
7. Your Address....................... .
However, we shall proceed to issue all payment details to the said Ms. Diane L. Mcallister, if we do not hear from you today, we will process and release the fund into Ms. Diane L. Mcallister's account.
NB: this is to inform you that you are required to pay for the TRANSFER CONTROL CODE (TCC) as you were informed earlier.
Confirm the receipt of this mail without any delay.
Thanks
Yours Sincerely
Mr. Desmond Walter
Director HSBC BANK USA

subject: Re: HSBC BANK USA
body:
Hello Mr. Desmond Walter,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, this is quite a surprise! I don't recall having any interactions with a Mrs. Esther or Ms. Diane L., but it's possible that there may be some confusion.

I'm not sure how my name got involved in this, but I would like to clarify a few things before we proceed further. Could you please provide more details about the fund transfer? How did Mrs. Esther come to choose me for this transaction?

Also, could you tell me more about the process of converting the fund into an ATM Master Card? That sounds interesting.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Jill
